name: Recent
query:
form_type not in ('3','4','5','3/A','4/A','5/A')
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: Ownership Filings
query:
form_type in ('3','4','5','3/A','4/A','5/A')
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: Ownership (Discretionary Buys/Sells)
query:
form_type in ('3','4','5','3/A','4/A','5/A')
and relationship = 'ISSUER'
and (description like 'Buy%' or description like 'Sell%')
and (description not like '%10b5%')
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: By Ticker
query:
cik = (select cik from ticker where ticker ilike {Ticker::MSFT})
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: By Company Name
Shelf Registration Tracker
query:
(form_type in ('S-3', 'S-3ASR') or form_type ilike '424B%' or form_type = 'EFFECT')
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: Periodic Reporting
query:
form_type in ('10-K', '10-Q', '20-F')
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: Mergers & Acquisitions
query:
form_type in ('425', '425/A') or tags && array['M&A']
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: IPOs
query:
form_type in ('S-1', 'S-1/A')
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: By Form Type
Presentations
query:
array['Presentation'] && tags
form_type = '8-K'
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: PDFs
query:
array['PDF'] && tags
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: Technical Reports
query:
array['Technical_Report'] && tags
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: Stock Splits
query:
array['Stock_Split'] && tags
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: SPAC Filings
query:
cik in (select cik from company where sic_name = 'BLANK CHECKS')
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: SPAC Decks
query:
cik in (select cik from company where sic_name = 'BLANK CHECKS')
array['Presentation'] && tags
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: Biotechs
query:
cik in (select cik from company where sic_code in ('2834', '2836'))
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: Friday Garbage Dump
query:
form_type in ('8-K', '8-K/A', '6-F', '6-F/A')
and date_published between (current_date - ((2 + cast(extract(dow from current_date) as int)) % 7) + time '1630') and (current_date - ((2 + cast(extract(dow from current_date) as int)) % 7)+1)
order by snowflake desc
limit 150

name: VIEs
query:
tags && array['VIE']
order by snowflake desc
limit 150
